canvas.finalizeWarning: Note! When you sign the painting, it will no longer be editable.
canvas.colorPicker.title: Color picker
canvas.colorPicker.desc: Select the tool, then pick up a color from the canvas and drag-and-drop it to a custom color slot.
canvas.colorCleaner.title: Color cleaner
canvas.colorCleaner.desc: Pick up some water and drag-and-drop it to a custom color slot to clear it.
canvas.canvasHolder.title: Canvas holder
canvas.canvasHolder.desc: Pick up the canvas and move it wherever you want. You can move the palette in the same way.
import.fail.1: You must have an empty canvas on your main-hand to import a painting in survival mode
import.fail.2: Your canvas must be the correct size to import this painting in survival mode (%1$s)
import.fail.3: You must have a palette with all basic colors on your off-hand to import a painting in survival mode
import.fail.4: Could not parse command or read the painting file (%1$s)
easel.deny: Someone else is working on this painting right now
